title: A Taste of Revenge
description: Sofia Castrillón has it all—a thriving company, a loyal best friend, and a love that ignites her soul. But when envy creeps into the heart of the woman she trusts most her perfect world shatters into pieces.Ana Gaston, Sofia’s confidante since college, has always been by her side. Until Lucio Nieves, a man who brings Sofia unparalleled joy, comes between them. As jealousy consumes Ana, a sinister plot unfolds, threatening to destroy everything Sofia holds dear.Betrayal lies, and a dangerous obsession spirals out of control. Can Sofia untangle the web of deceit and reclaim her life before it’s too late? This heart-pounding suspense novel is a gripping tale of love, loss, and the dark side of ambition.A MODERN-DAY STORY OF PASSION, LOVE, AND BETRAYAL.
author: Mercy Jane Porquez Ballesteros
